description:
Arigase Ryoko is one of Koizumi`s few close friends. She remain calms, despite whatever craziness is going on around her at any given time. She usually puts on a face to match the situation, as well as saying something to go with it.
She supports Saji and Koizumi`s relationship, and enjoys putting them in compromising situations and making various short comments concerning her take on what Koizumi really means when the girl expresses frustration or hatred for Saji.
name: Arigase Ryouko
